name: HACK-DE-SCIENCE
description: HACK-DE-SCIENCE is the biggest event of Vishwa-Code Genesis, designed to provide the freedom to use any development tool to bring ideas to life. It is a team-based event where solo participation is not allowed. Teams can have either 2 or 4 members.
details: It’s a 36-hour hackathon, promoting the usage of new and trending technologies. It will consist of 3 rounds of evaluations. The last round would also involve a presentation and the product demonstration.
rules: The project needs to be implemented from scratch in a new repository.
Referencing documentation is allowed, but plagiarism is strictly prohibited and will lead to disqualification.
The decision of the organizing team is final and binding.
Further rules will be shared at the start of the event.

event_head.description: Photo of event head will be here

name: Vishwa-Code Mania
description: If you love competitive coding, or problem-solving in general, then this is THE event for you! Code Mania is the flagship competitive programming event of our prestigious institute. This is a team event where the size of a team can vary from 1 member to 3 members. So, this event will not only help you hone your problem-solving skills but also contribute to your capacity to work with a team under pressure!
details: Prelims: It will be a 2.5-hour contest with six programming problems. Finals: It will be a 3-hour contest consisting of six programming problems to solve. Note: Both Rounds are Offline, at NIT Jamshedpur Campus.
rules: The decision of the organizing team is final and binding.
Usage of any wrong means will lead to immediate disqualification.
